QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Abdominal aortic aneurysm repair - open
QAPair.Answer: Open abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) repair is surgery to fix a widened part in your aorta. This is called an aneurysm . The aorta is the large artery that carries blood from your heart to your belly (abdomen), pelvis, and legs. An aortic aneurysm is when part of this artery becomes too large or balloons outward.
